Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Jar with an ovoid profile, two handles, a short but medium size neck, a slightly thickened lip and a conical base. The interior is pink while the exterior is green with black spots.  The exterior, although polished, still bears numerous throwing marks as well as several calcareous inclusions.
